PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS which will give effect to announcements made in the 1998 Federal Budget, such as Special Opportunities Grants, Special Interest-Free Period, debt reduction assistance and revised eligibility criteria.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0402 Publication Date: 1998-08-19

precis:
Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS
which will give effect to announcements made in the 1998 Federal Budget,
such as Special Opportunities Grants, Special Interest-Free Period, debt
reduction assistance and revised eligibility criteria.
